notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Socioeconomic data are freely available at: http://www.isee.nc/population/, or upon request to: isee@isee.nc. Satelite images are freely available at http://earthexplorer.usgs.gov/ Epidemiological data at the neighbourhood resolution are freely available at http://www.dass.gouv.nc/portal/page/portal/dass/observatoire_sante/veille_sanitaire/Dengue Epidemiological data at the islet resolution are available upon request to the Health Department of the Direction of Sanitary and Social Affairs (DASS-NC) for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data by writing to: Service des actions sanitaires DASS-NC, BP N4, 98851 NOUMEA Cedex, Nouvelle-Cal√©donie (email: dass@gouv.nc). Data is not fully available without restrictions: legal restrictions exist, as the authorisation from the Department of Sanitary and Social Affairs of New Caledonia (DASS-NC) is required to access epidemiological data at the islet resolution.
